Underwater Communication: Communication would be different as sound waves do not travel well underwater. Instead of speaking, we would need to use underwater writing or sign language to communicate.
Underwater Food: Food would need to be adapted to the underwater environment. We would need to grow seaweed or harvest fish and other sea creatures for sustenance.
Underwater Transportation: Transportation would be challenging as cars and planes do not work underwater. We would need to develop underwater vehicles like submarines or underwater trains.

Underwater Housing: Housing would need to be built to withstand the pressure of the water and to provide adequate ventilation. We would need to use materials like concrete or steel to build our homes.

Underwater Education: Education would need to be adapted to the underwater environment. We would need to learn how to communicate and work underwater, as well as how to survive in the unique conditions of the ocean.
